properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 6 at 2:57PM AKST until January 7 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage AK
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
An Ice Jam in...
the Kenai River at Big Eddy.

* Until 300 PM AKST Tuesday.

* At 257 PM AKST, the Kenai Peninsula Borough reported an ice jam
near Big Eddy State Recreation Site which is causing flooding in
the Riverside Drive Subdivision.  As of Monday morning there was
water in the Riverside Drive subdivision and water was flowing
over Riverside Land and Eddy Lane.  Vehicle access is not
currently possible past Amiyung Drive on Eddy Lane.

* Please do not drive vehicles in this area for both safety and to
prevent road damage.

* As of Monday afternoon, the KPB did a survey of the Ciechanski
Road Subdivison and reports that there is no flooding occuring on
the north side of the river.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
the Big Eddy area near Soldotna.
